languages: Understands common but can;'t speak, telepathy 60 ft

abilities.name: Advanced Telepathy
abilities.description: The flumph can perceive the content of any telapathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy

abilities.name: Prone Deficiency
abilities.description: If the flumph is knocked prone, roll a die. On an odd result, the flumph lands upside-down and is incapacitated. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, righting itself and ending the incapcitated condition if it succeeds.

abilities.name: Telepathic Shroud
abilities.description: The flumph is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as divination spells.

name: Flumph

actions.name: Tendrils
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit, reach 5ft, one creature
Hit: 1d4 + 2 piercing damage plus 1d4 acid damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target must make a DC10 Constitution saving throw, taking 2 (1d4) acid damage on a failure or ending this effect on a success. A Lesser Restoration spell cast on the target also ends this effect.

actions.name: Stench Spray (1/day)
actions.description: Each creature within a 15-foot cone originating from the flumph must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a foul smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for 1d4 hours. THe coated creature is poisoned as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are poisoned while within 5 feet of the coated creature. Acreature can remove the stench on itself by taking a 1 hour bath in water, alchohol, or vinegar.
